title: History Extra podcast - October 2009 - Part 1
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - October 2009 - Part 1
itunes:subtitle: Amanda Vickery talks about her new radio series that delves into the history of private lives in Britain. Also in this edition Ian Mortimer explains why he thinks Henry V was a cruel king who doesn’t deserve his heroic reputation.
description:
Amanda Vickery talks about her new radio series that delves into the history of private lives in Britain. Also in this edition Ian Mortimer explains why he thinks Henry V was a cruel king who doesn’t deserve his heroic reputation.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
